meanings.definition: The act of disuniting or separating.
meanings.sent1: The disunions in the family caused sadness.
meanings.sent2: The disunions among the team led to inefficiency.
meanings.sent3: The disunions over who gets the last cookie were comical.
meanings.sent4: The disunions between the puzzle pieces made it hard to complete.
meanings.sent5: The disunions in the group project made it challenging to work together.

meanings.sent1: The disunions in their music band affected their performance.
meanings.sent2: The disunions within the community caused tension.
meanings.sent3: The disunions in the colors of the painting gave it a unique look.
meanings.sent4: The disunions in the orchestra created a discordant sound.
meanings.sent5: The disunions in the garden design made it look chaotic.

meanings.sent1: The disunions between the friends were resolved through communication.
meanings.sent2: The disunions at the meeting delayed the decision-making process.
meanings.sent3: The disunions over the movie choice led to a funny debate.
meanings.sent4: The disunions in the courtroom were settled by the judge.
meanings.sent5: The disunions during the game caused excitement among the spectators.
